userStory.storyName: Perform CRUD operations on a user in Reqres.in API
userStory.displayName: Perform CRUD operations on a user in Reqres.in API
userStory.narrative:
As an API tester
  I want to perform Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations on a user
  So that I can verify the functionality of the Reqres.in API

title: End-to-End test of user CRUD operations
